automation or
augmentation in essence automation takes
rote tests and does them for the user
which is really great for anything
that's super tedious or boring like copy

ability or it improves their existing

that are creative nuanced things we

like analyzing

example of this um we take this

today all right so completely

rating a quick summary and the total
